website_summaries.verdict: If you just can't stomach the taste of other options, the natural fruit flavor of these gummies get rave reviews.
pros: Gummy multivitamins in orange, strawberry and lemon flavors
Gives a dose of 11 key nutrients and added Omega-3s
Made to be gluten-free and does not use artificial flavors or sweeteners
Also free from allergens like shellfish, wheat, egg, nuts and more
cons: May melt if shipped in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't order in the summer times. It will arrive with all the dummies melted into one big glob.
customer_reviews.author: erwin

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: AT THE BEGINNING I HAD A LITTLE FEAR OF THE CRITICS. BUT THE VITAMINS ARRIVED IN PERFECT CONDITIONS WITHOUT ANY PROBLEM OR DAMAGE. THE TASTE IS VERY GOOD. YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL WITH THE DOSES BECAUSE YOU CAN EAT ALL OF A TIME
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRA ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Love Centrum Chewable Gummies...
customer_reviews.text: A vitamin I don’t mind taking! Gastric bypass forces chewables or liquid and this Centrum 50+ Adult makes them the perfect option for me. Priced well and easy to keep in stock with Subscribe and Save. Great vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Beeingood

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These seem to give me some energy. Just take in the morning after a small breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Toni House

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to swallow large capsules or tablets, which are often seen in nutritional supplements, so I was delighted to find the product. It has a pleasant taste a perfect chewable texture. This product has become a regular part of my daily health regimen.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl41

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick on the go.....
customer_reviews.text: Good for a quick on the go chewable vitamin. Thanks Amazon for good value.
customer_reviews.author: Steel

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. However, I am unable to even open this bottle. The gummies are all melted and cannot be consumed. I am very disappointed. I have collected from my shipping company outside of the USA so I cannot return the item.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they were fine when they left the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these online to avoid going to the store during the pandemic. They must have sat somewhere in very high temperatures because when they arrived they were all sort of melted together in the bottom of the bottle stuck together with a weird film on them. It's almost impossible to even get them out and I'm not sure they're even viable after whatever happened to them that caused this. I don't think they left the manufacturer this way (I've had them before from a store and they were fine) and we haven't had hot enough temperatures where I live to cause this. For stuff you ingest, it's probably better to see what you're buying, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Seasonal
customer_reviews.text: Good product , except in Summer. You most likely will get a big melted blob in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Rotten!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived timely and appeared ok from the outside. Expiration date says 08/2020. However, these gummies are definitely rotten. I had to spit it out it tasted so bad. I thought maybe it was my tastebuds, but my boyfriend had the same reaction. Based on other reviews, I guess I shouldn’t be surprised. Buyer beware. I’d select another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Good product for overall health
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and did help with overall health but iam giving it 4 stars because this multi vitamin doesn't contain iron which is so important for women health.
customer_reviews.author: Gulshafaq

customer_reviews.title: Different from a prior purchase of same
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened with this batch. But the gummies chew like you are chewing on rubber. I take them with a glass of warm water to melt them a bit and that has kept them okay to use, but they are certainly nothing like the ones I purchased earlier. What I like is however, as a whole, they aren't overly sweet, but then aren't overly favorful either. But as long as they provide you with the vitamins the bottle says they do, and since I dislike having to take the non-chewable tablet and capsule type of vitamins, this will do.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chewable Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I loved that these are chewable. They’re not like gummie candies but you can chew them. I bought this for my elderly Mom because the regular Centrum Silver tablets were humongous and hard for her to swallow. She doesn’t like the flavor but she like that they are chewable and the off taste doesn’t last long. I would definitely buy these again. They’re a nice alternative to downing large pills.
customer_reviews.author: nada

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Gross/no good/don't buy. I just keep getting bad vitamins on Amazon. I'm not ordering vitamins on here anymore.
customer_reviews.author: randomwingnuts

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and make taking vitamins a pleasure!
customer_reviews.text: I always had a problem remembering to take my vitamins because I hated the taste and the size. And then I tried these gummy’s and I’m so glad I did. They are delicious and make taking vitamins a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in your product...
customer_reviews.text: I did not use these right away but when I did open the seal to use, they looked like the product was moldy looking . I will not but again. They may still be good but because of the appearance I could not chew up....
customer_reviews.author: Gravy

customer_reviews.title: Melted mess
customer_reviews.text: The chewable vitamin gummies had melted together into one big Mass. They are unusable and disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Berry flavor gummy vitamins
customer_reviews.text: YUK!!! They taste terrible. I really expected them to taste great, like candy. I'm not sure if i can stand to take 2 of these every day! what a waste of money. At least they weren't super expensive! If you're looking for great tasting vitamins, buy something else! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: debbi

customer_reviews.title: not fun! and i have ordered gummy vitamins before
customer_reviews.text: my vitamins arrived TOTALLY MELTED!!! not fun! and i have ordered gummy vitamins before.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Completely melted into one solid smelly lump
customer_reviews.text: this product was completely melted into one solid lump at the bottom of the bottle. I don't understand why, because I got a bottle in late July and it wasn't like that at all. These were completely ruined and had to be thrown away! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Flanary

customer_reviews.title: melted into glob
customer_reviews.text: Most of this jar is unusable as the gummies melted into one big glob. The package was handed to me by delivery agent not left in the sun. The jar has been in my air-conditioned home unopened as I had another jar to finish first. When I opened this new jar, I could not get the vitamins apart and when I click on "orders and returns" there is no return option for me to get a fresh jar. I would also question whether extreme heat impacts the effectiveness/quality of the product. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: rwashopper

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These chewable vitamins are so easy to eat. Unfortunately, I had to stop using them because I started eating them like candy. That's a definite no-no as far as vitamins are concerned. And so, I reluctantly gave them up. For those with stronger willpower, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are so tasty, I don’t see any difference in taste between these and regular gummy candy. Usually with multi-vitamins in pill form there is an off taste, and they’re also usually huge & hard to swallow. For these reasons I would dread taking my vitamins and would skip it all the time. Now with these gummies I never skip, I actually look forward to taking them! With all the Vitamin B I see a noticeable difference in my energy levels, and now with COVID I feel safer boosting my immune system daily. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the gummy vite for me!
customer_reviews.text: Price is reasonable; however, the taste is terible. They are very dry and have a very bland flavor. They taste old and dry. I have a hard time with aftertaste of standard pill and capsule vitamins and always try to get a flavored gummy vite to ease my problem with taste. These are not the vitamins I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sputzybird

customer_reviews.title: These taste really good!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously;these taste awesome! I wish I could eat more than one a day. I assume these are providing all the daily amounts of vitamins and omega 3 etc because I want to keep taking them! They sure do beat the awful big dry multi vitamin I used to have to choke down in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: If you hate swallowing the big horse pills that vitamins tend to be, you'll love these gummies. You can get your vitamins from a trusted source and have a little treat in the bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Leedom

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins delevered.
customer_reviews.text: Quick receipt with no problems. It's nice to notice I'm running low on something and have it delevered in a couple days. No problems with product,
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy! The only problem is, I want to eat more than the serving size!
customer_reviews.author: CourtMader

customer_reviews.title: My grandma loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these along with ensure for my 99 year old great grandma who needed to gain some weight. Within 2 weeks her appetite increased and she’s gaining some much needed weight. They are easy for her to chew and she says they taste good! I’m glad we found something that works and that she likes
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Brooks

customer_reviews.title: A vitamin a day . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have a monthly subscription. I can tell the difference from when I didn't take them. I thought it was worth a try. Six months later and I'm still popping them daily!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin will order again
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered this to try. I have tried many vitamin and this product was the 1st one that did not give me a headache from high vitamin A. I Will be ordering this again. These are chewy vitamins orange, berry & lemon, not to crazy about the lemon tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerb

customer_reviews.title: It's a good brand name and it works
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this brand so I figured I'd try it for my husband along with several other brands. He did not say so far which he likes best. I think as long as he can chew it, he's happy. So it may be a waste to buy organic for him since he doesn't seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: The bottle sent appeared to be aged. The gummies are very tough
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. The bottle sent had very stiff, tough gummies. The previous bottle, that I had finished the day before, had pleasantly soft gummies, so it was easy to sense the change.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Delaney, MD, MS, author

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is ok for a vitamin. It still has the vitamin taste, but you have to remember what is in it. The gummy's are nice and easy to chew. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: So much better than non chewable vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: If you have trouble swallowing large tablets like I do then gummies are the only way to go. I tossed out all of mine and will never go back. These are like gum drops! For the first time ever, I look forward to taking mine every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gilded Lily

customer_reviews.title: No fish oil taste or smell
customer_reviews.text: It has a great taste, you won’t know there is a fish oil. I can’t smell or obviously eat fish oil so for me it’s important do not feel or smell it . 5 stars only on the taste, just started to take them so don’t know if there will be any effect I’m expecting to
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Checks all the boxes. And you actually don't mind taking because it's not another pill
customer_reviews.text: Before these just waking up seemed a chore. Forcing myself to go to work was a real struggle. Still not a morning person, but now I start out in first gear. Whereas before I had trouble just turning the key to start the car, so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with order
customer_reviews.text: Good day, Item was purchased however, was very disappointed with the product received. i ordered 2 bottle of vitamins for Men 50+ and when i got the package, all the vitamins were hard and stuck together. that made it very hard for my dad to chew and take out a gummy vitamin from the bottle. I am not sure if i will be purchasing this item again
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Quality product as always.
customer_reviews.text: Centrum does not disappoint. There are no negatives for this Gummy Vitamin for adults. Good value, good taste and I have to assume it is healthy and works because I have not had a cold in 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Centrum MultiGummies
customer_reviews.text: Long-time One-a-Day user. When they weren't available switched to Centrum MultiGummies. Several years ago switched from hard tablets to gummies. These taste and texture of the Centrum MultiGummies are by far the best to me.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Different. Counterfeit?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand of multivitamin gummies for years. They've always have been translucent and delicious. These are opaque and they taste bad. Either the manufacturer changed the formula or what I've received is counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: These chewable gummies are not chewable
customer_reviews.text: First ,I got past the "rank" smell when I opened the bottle. Then I tried to bite one of the gummies and it was like trying to bite one of my dog's chew toys. it was soft, but not penerable to chew like one of my dogs chew toys. I threw the vitamin away. Can I return and opened bottle of vitamins?
customer_reviews.author: jeniferjordan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, great tasting omega-3s and vitamins;is worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can not taste the vitamins and that their flavors were so good. This is one of the vitamins in my home that we love and will continue to use because it tastes great, is affordable and has the vitamins we are looking for and contains Omega-3s.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly fair

customer_reviews.title: Whete is my refund ??? Its been two weeks & no response.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt , it was returned due to they all melted into 1 solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Valley

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but if in warm climate do not order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I put these on subscribe and save and the first shipment was a big melted glob so I got a replacement and when it came it was a big melted glob. Stopping the subscription, but love the product.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like sewer once I opened the sealant.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but the entire bottle of vitamins had a foul odor (smells like rotten egg or sewer). I think it was somehow containminated. I spitted out the one I popped into my mouth and garggled to make sure. Then I immediately threw out the entire bottle. Probably not the seller's fault. It was at the manufacturing level.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Y. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Easy chewables, extreme price increase
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes these everyday says he likes them better than regular tablets that are no longer made. Large in size but easy as chewables Tried to reorder price has gone (june4 2020 ) 9.95 to 34.95 today Sept 5,2020. Won’t be reordering at such a price increase sorry to say.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sinisi

customer_reviews.title: This one looks like a giant gummy instead of gummy‘s.
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I got was Greek this is my second bottle. When it arrived it a ride like one giant gummy returning. Be careful when you order this product in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ann Stark

customer_reviews.title: It's a valuable tool.
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent product for a person who has had stage 4 throat cancer. She is no longer able to swallow many things, so we have been shopping for gummy products. It meets her needs. She just turned 82 and is currently cancer free.
customer_reviews.author: geri cormier

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and value. Now I don’t have to take extra Omega 3. This is al inclusive. My body dies not absorb normally so I have to use the gummies.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Why so expensive now?
customer_reviews.text: Why so expensive now? Theses were great vitamins, but our family stopped buying them because they cost 2-3 times as much now.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These gummy vitamins are the best! They taste wonderful. They were NOT melted together in a big lump, as others have complained. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: jftw

customer_reviews.title: I love Centrum, they're are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for sending me two bottle's of Centrum, hair, nails, and skin vitamins 💗. I love Centrum, they're are excellent, which is why I purchased it. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Laa-Laa

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: They are tasty. They have all kinds of vitamins and minerals. Been taking them for a year and when I don't take them I do feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: T D Butler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste as good as the Vitafusion gummies
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of taking gummies for vitamins. However, taste of Centrum Vitamins for women doesn't taste as good and takes longer to chew than VitaFusion gummies. These are ok as a backup plan.
customer_reviews.author: Slane0414

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to find this vitamin in the usual capsule so I tried these. I was worried they may taste like a chewable vitamin from “back in the day“. Happy to say these taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Melted....
customer_reviews.text: These came very warm and several had melted. I wanted to replace them, but I took them anyway. They still worked. Nails were much thicker, hair seemed a bit nicer. No change in my skin. Just had my last dose yesterday. I’ll probably buy more, but not from here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Tasted so nice you didn’t even realize it was a vitamin. If your a fan of fruit snacks or fruit flavored candy this vitamin is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the cheapest gummies, bit they're definitely the most delicious. And I love that they support my beauty as well as my health.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E Carter

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but delivery method leaves a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite so far. However, it's hit or miss whether they'll come appropriately, or completely melted into a mess of sticky chunks. One bottle I had shipped is completely useless. But as far as the flavor and texture, it is delicious. It doesn't have a ton of Omega-3s, though, so I take an additional supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wollam

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and easy to chew.
customer_reviews.text: As far a gummies go, these taste pretty good. Also, these are easy to chew which isn't always the case. The price was right for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: MollyLA

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Gummies make easier to take than large hard pill, especially for those have trouble swallowing. Cons: Yucky taste. Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sadly when vitamins and supplements get to pricey, it’s the first we forgo. Really appreciate the quality and price of these.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: absolute favorites
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorites! Taste like chuckles candy. When you read the ingredients, its the best value of all the centrum products.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin mix gummy with great taste
customer_reviews.text: First Centrum product I've had with good taste. Not only a quality multi mix, but these gummies are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much more than the pills. They taste great and have helped my energy level.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed vitamins stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if these vitamins were sitting in heat in a warehouse but they are all stuck together. I have to pick them apart and to be honest they don’t taste great. I have had these before and they were not like this
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn H

customer_reviews.title: Melted together when arrived
customer_reviews.text: They were melted into one giant glob by the time they were delivered to me. Expensive price to pay for bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzbenz

customer_reviews.title: Inspect items contents immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace the original item; melted gummies. But the replacement process was so simple and easy. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL LAUTER

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to digest Delicious yummy flavors Best value multi vitamin Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second bottle. Arrived in perfect condition. Taste great, like gummie bears. Very easy to eat
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great! Good product
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and helped my boost my immune system during convention week in Las Vegas. (I think it helped!)
customer_reviews.author: Nihli

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Sometimes I can find them in the store and sometimes I can’t. These were great.
customer_reviews.author: Valesia

customer_reviews.title: If you like to eat and have small appetite these are for you.
customer_reviews.text: The vitamins taste nasty and every time I take these vitamins I feel hungry all the time. Not for me
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived melted and basically stuck to container it was impossible to get them.out
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Battista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, very good quality, easy to use and excellent, recommended by the seller
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sosa

customer_reviews.title: One Giant Glob.
customer_reviews.text: Gummy vitamins arrived as one giant glob. Can't pick them apart. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Box

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding these locally! Love them! Will ourchase more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Caporaso

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: Elderly mother takes too many pills as it is, loves the chewable vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: James Ball

customer_reviews.title: No Sprinkles
customer_reviews.text: These are good vitamins, but none of the little sugar sprinkles I like on my gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Suwanneelady9

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'll be buying more. Taste is so good it's hard to only eat 2 a day.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Received after a month and melted
customer_reviews.text: Update on review. I received item after a month and after I had received a refund. The gummy vitamins were all melted into one blob and stuck in the bottle. This could be a one off thing but that was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Nice flavors. Drink lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: I am not reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Smells not pretty. A sugar used outside the gummies. Did not feel the effect
customer_reviews.author: Zafar Abdullaev

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to chew! Flavor is ok...taste almost nothing. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: fahitachine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected to read about it.
customer_reviews.text: I took 2, but after I read the label I realized that everything needed in a vitamin was in my regular Centrum Silver daily vitamin. I want to return this. May I?
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline T Karel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Most of my supplements are gummies. I didn't like the sugar crystals and will look for a brand that doesn't have them.
customer_reviews.author: V-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, low calorie, and they might even work.
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. I,love them. First time i looked forward to taking vitamins,
customer_reviews.author: madelynn

customer_reviews.title: Good product tastes good .
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my dad . He says he likes them . It’s not hard taking vitamins when they taste like candy .
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Gummy candy vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These gummy candy vitamins taste like cool aid flavors. I think it’s much better than the typical chalky vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!!!! Some vitamins have horrible tastes but this one is amazing to eat!! Love it!!! Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I feel they are doing me some good.
customer_reviews.text: My nails are stronger. I enjoy taking them instead of it being one more pill
customer_reviews.author: REGINA CLAEYS

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than mega-pill!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fine, easy to chew, far more pleasant than the horse-sized multi-vitamins I've taken for years.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands of gummy vitamins, and this one is by far the best. Definitely the best tasting.
customer_reviews.author: bb-girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and observable results
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a friend when I asked her how her hair got so long and healthy. I've only been taking it for the past week or so but I can already notice a difference in my skin! Delicious and easy way to get my vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Sierra B.

customer_reviews.title: wife likes these
customer_reviews.text: wife got tired of the big pills she likes these
customer_reviews.author: R. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Take your vitamins, say your prayers, listen to your parents...
customer_reviews.text: I hate taking a lot of pills... This is a nice alternative.
customer_reviews.author: AllMightyMouse

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, but become concrete in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Even with being careful to leave the moisture "packet" in the bottle, these things become a glob of concrete over time. Getting them out from the bottom of the bottle is an act of futility. Lots of gummy type deliveries systems for drugs these days....I've seen better than this
customer_reviews.author: cindygirl63

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order through here
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t taste the product, Threw item Away was melted all the way like a plastic.
customer_reviews.author: ALiz

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: Gummies were not eatable as they arrived melted in 1 big chunk
customer_reviews.author: Estefany L.

product_meta.title: Centrum MultiGummies Adults (120 Count, Natural Cherry, Berry, Orange Flavor) Multivitamin/Multimineral Supplement Gummies, Vitamins B12, D, E, Age 50+
product_meta.description:
Style:Adult 50+| Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)Centrum MultiGummies 50+ is a great tasting, easy to take multivitamin crafted with key nutrients that help support your whole body including your heart,(2) brain,(3) and bones.(4) These multi-benefit multivitamins are age-adjusted for adults 50+ and include 100% or more of essential nutrients, Vitamins B12, D, and E. Centrum MultiGummies Adults 50+ contain three natural flavors: Cherry, Berry, and Orange. Plus, Centrum MultiGummies 50+ are gluten-free and have no artificial flavors or sweeteners.

(1) Among leading gummy multivitamins
(2) Heart Health: B-Vitamins help support heart health*(5)
(3) Brain Health: Zinc and B-vitamins help support normal brain function*
(4) Bone Health: Vitamin D and Calcium help maintain strong bones*
(5) Not a replacement for cholesterol-lowering drugs

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Satisfaction Guarantee
If for any reason you are not satisfied with any GSK Consumer Healthcare product, GSK Consumer Healthcare will provide you with a reimbursement within 45 days of the date of purchase. Please note that because GSK is unable to control the quality of our products sold by unauthorized sellers, the Guarantee is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers due to potential quality issues outside GSK’s control. Please contact GSK Consumer Healthcare directly for more information.
feature_bullets: Includes 120 gummies of Centrum MultiGummies Adult Multivitamin / Multimineral Supplement crafted for age 50+
Formulated with 100% or more of the daily value of the essential nutrients Vitamins D, B12 and E
More Vitamin D3 than any other gummy multivitamin (1)
Crafted with key nutrients that help support your whole body including your heart,(2) brain,(3) and bones.(4)
Gluten-free vitamin with no artificial flavors or sweeteners in three natural flavors: cherry, berry, and orange
